SELECT gnum, bggnum, GAMETITLE, GAMETITLE_ENG, RELEASE_YEAR, gamephoto_url, game_rank, totalviewcount, rate, weight, BGG_THUMBNAIL, tot, theme FROM ( SELECT g.gnum, g.bggnum, g.gametitle, g.gametitle_eng, g.release_year,g.totalviewcount, ga.fullname AS gamephoto_url, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY g.totalviewcount DESC) AS game_rank, gr.rate, gr.weight, g.BGG_THUMBNAIL, gr.tot, g.theme FROM game g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gnum, fullname FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY gnum ORDER BY create_date DESC) rnum, gnum, fullname FROM game_attach ) WHERE rnum = 1 ) ga ON g.gnum = ga.gnum LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gnum, avg(rating) as rate, avg(weight) as weight, count(*) tot FROM game_rating GROUP BY gnum ) gr ON g.gnum = gr.gnum WHERE g.del = 'n' ORDER BY game_rank, gnum ) WHERE game_rank BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select gnum, f.${filter}, f.anum num from ${mappingTable} m, ${filter} f where m.anum = f.anum
select gnum, f.${filter}, f.cnum num from game_category m, category f where m.cnum = f.cnum
select gnum, f.${filter}, f.dnum num from ${mappingTable} m, ${filter} f where m.dnum = f.dnum
select gnum, f.${filter}, f.mnum num from ${mappingTable} m, ${filter} f where m.mnum = f.mnum
select gnum, f.${filter}, f.pnum num from ${mappingTable} m, ${filter} f where m.pnum = f.pnum
) b on g.gnum = b.gnum WHERE g.del = 'n' and b.num=#{num} ORDER BY rcount, game_rank ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
